member.name: M:Sample.Api.Startup.ConfigureSwagger(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.IApiVersionDescriptionProvider)
member.summary: Override this method if you need to configure Swagger endpoint, e.g. using UseSwagger() and UseSwaggerUI() extension methods.

member.name: T:Sample.Api.SwaggerDefaultValues
member.summary: Represents the Swagger/Swashbuckle operation filter used to document the implicit API version parameter.
member.remarks: This is only required due to bugs in the . Once they are fixed and published, this class can be removed.

member.name: M:Sample.Api.SwaggerDefaultValues.Apply(Microsoft.OpenApi.Models.OpenApiOperation,Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.OperationFilterContext)
member.summary: Applies the filter to the specified operation using the given context.
member.param: The operation to apply the filter to.
